name: recreio-js
description: Javascript package for the API provided by recre.io

scripts.build: browserify src/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > dist/recreio.js && browserify dist/recreio.js -d --plugin [minifyify --map dist/recreio.min.map.json --output dist/recreio.min.map.json] > dist/recreio.min.js

author: recre.io
